Producer: Beth LaMure, Jane Badler, Deborah Moore, Sean E. DeMott
Rating: PG-13 (Some Suggestive Images|Brief Strong Language|Some Drug Material|Mature Thematic Content)
Synopsis: An 11-year-old maintains a loving but unconventional bond with her mother -- a woman who's been battling cancer for the last five years.
Title: Daisy Winters
